author: remyroy
content: We have been working on improving the official Ethereum Launchpad for Pectra by updating content, refreshing some elements and adding the new user-triggered staking feature such as exit, withdrawals and consolidation requests. We currently have a public staging environment on devnet-5 accessible on <https://deploy-preview-721--dapper-rolypoly-9814ad.netlify.app/>. We would love to get your feedback on all this new stuff. I still have a bunch of devnet-5 ETH if you need any for testing. I'm happy to send some along if you give me your address.
